definitions.definition: An irregular heartbeat ; a lack of a regular pulse
A disease entity involving such beats, such as atrial fibrillation , ventricular tachycardia , AV nodal reentrant tachycardia , or others.

main_definition: An irregular heartbeat ; a lack of a regular pulse
secondary_definitions: A disease entity involving such beats, such as atrial fibrillation , ventricular tachycardia , AV nodal reentrant tachycardia , or others.
